Class LyricsService

java.lang.Object
musicApp.services.LyricsService
public class LyricsService extends Object
Service class for managing song lyrics. Handles loading lyrics content and creating SongLyricsEntry objects.

      public LyricsService() throws SettingsFilesException

  • Method Details

    • getLyricsEntry

      public SongLyrics getLyricsEntry(Song song) throws LyricsNotFoundException
      Gets a SongLyricsEntry containing the lyrics content for a song.
      Parameters:
      song - The song to get lyrics for
      Returns:
      A SongLyricsEntry with the song's lyrics content
      Throws:
      LyricsNotFoundException

    • loadTextLyrics

      private List<String> loadTextLyrics(String relativePath)
      Loads text lyrics from a file
      Parameters:
      relativePath - Path to the lyrics file, relative to the lyrics folder
      Returns:
      List of lyrics lines, or empty list if file doesn't exist or can't be read

    • loadKaraokeLyrics

      private List<KaraokeLine> loadKaraokeLyrics(String relativePath)
      Loads karaoke lyrics from an LRC file
      Parameters:
      relativePath - Path to the LRC file, relative to the lyrics folder
      Returns:
      List of KaraokeLine objects, or empty list if file doesn't exist or can't be parsed

    • isValidLyricsPath

      private boolean isValidLyricsPath(String relativePath)
      Checks if the given relative path is valid and exists in the lyrics folder
      Parameters:
      relativePath - The relative path to check
      Returns:
      true if the path is valid and exists, false otherwise

    • saveLyrics

      public void saveLyrics(Song song, String lyricsContent) throws IOException, NullPointerException, LyricsOperationException
      Saves text lyrics for a song
      Parameters:
      song - The song to save lyrics for
      lyricsContent - The lyrics content to save
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error writing to the file
      NullPointerException - If song or lyrics content is null
      LyricsOperationException - If the repository update fails

    • getLyricsFileName

      private String getLyricsFileName(String songName)
      Returns the lyrics file name based on the song name. If the song name does not end with .mp3 or .wav, returns null.

    • lrcToTxt

      public void lrcToTxt(Song song) throws LyricsNotFoundException, NullPointerException, IOException, LyricsOperationException
      Extracts plain text from karaoke lyrics and saves it
      Parameters:
      song - The song to extract lyrics for
      Throws:
      LyricsNotFoundException - If lyrics are not found
      NullPointerException - If song is null
      IOException - If there is an error writing to the file
      LyricsOperationException - If any lyrics operation fails

    • importLrc

      public void importLrc(Song song, Path sourceLrcFile, Boolean overwriteTxt) throws IOException, NullPointerException, LyricsOperationException, LyricsNotFoundException
      Imports a .lrc file and updates the lyrics mapping.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error reading or writing files
      NullPointerException - If song or LRC file is null
      LyricsOperationException - If any lyrics operation fails
      LyricsNotFoundException

    • parseLrcFile

      private List<KaraokeLine> parseLrcFile(Path lrcPath) throws IOException
      Parses the given .lrc file into a list of KaraokeLine objects. Each line has format: [mm:ss.xx] lyric text
      Parameters:
      lrcPath - The path to the .lrc file.
      Returns:
      A list of KaraokeLine sorted in ascending time order.
      Throws:
      IOException - If reading the file fails.

    • parseKaraokeLine

      private Optional<KaraokeLine> parseKaraokeLine(Pattern pattern, String line)
      Parses a single line of karaoke lyrics.
      Parameters:
      pattern - The regex pattern to match the line.
      line - The line to parse.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the KaraokeLine if matched, otherwise empty.

    • txtExists

      public boolean txtExists(Song currentSong)
